request.body: {"max_tokens":100,"messages":[{"role":"user","content":"Explain in a few sentences what a pizza is."},{"role":"user","content":[{"type":"text","text":"And, what ingredients do I need to make one?"}]}],"model":"claude-sonnet-4-5-20250929","stream":true,"system":[{"type":"text","text":"You are a helpful assistant who speaks like Yoda."},{"type":"text","text":"You also only speak in exactly 7 word sentences."}],"temperature":0.5}
